paper_metadata.title: The Role and Impact of Remittances in Supporting the Economy of Kosovo

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: we discover the effects and impacts of remittances on the well-being of recipients such as: improving their lives, poverty alleviation, employment growth, raising the educational level and improvement in health condition
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: According to CBK statistics, immigrants' remittances continue to be over 500 million Euros per year

bonus_information.cost_mentions: Remittances reached $414 billion in 2009, remittances from Kosovar immigrants over 500 million Euros per year
bonus_information.cost_evidence_citation: According to World Bank estimates, Remittances reached $414 billion in 2009, of which $316 billion went to developing countries | According to CBK statistics, immigrants' remittances continue to be over 500 million Euros per year

evidence_citations.country_citation: The purpose of the paper is to study the role and impact of Remittances in supporting the economy of Kosovo
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Nearly 20% of families in Kosovo receive remittances from their family members who are abroad
